data.name: Naranjo misiones
data.desc: Good reception of Fray Geronimo Naranjo leads to a series of missions, principally by Frays José Delgado and Francisco Gallegos [ie inc Delgado journey of 1677], resulting in reduction of Mache Chols
data.agents_sp: Fr Geronimo Naranjo, José Delgado, Francisco Gallegos
data.note:
Includes Delgado misión of 1677 and Sp encounters with Bartholomew Sharp at St. George’s /
 1678 [S Hon?] Some or vars Chol Mayans burn their reducción settlements and flee /v Bolland F 18
